name: Murcianico vs Aliens - Aliens Invaders
description:
Android & Windows:

They came to earth by water.

A lettuce has 95% water.

Protect your lettuces with the help of your dog and shooting the aliens.

A classic arcade to relieve yourself by shooting extraterrestrials.

12 Phases.

12 Final boss.

3  Different weapons.

Texts in Spanish and English.

Textos en español e inglés.

Available for android and windows.

A/O = Left   D/P = Right

Or use the cursor keys or the joystick to move the character.

M/Space = Shootong  Z/L = Release the dog

A button on the joystick to shooting.
B button on the joystick to release the dog.

Esc key to exit the game.

Android :   https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.JMGrisUmpierrez.MurcianicoVsAl...
